screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .looklibrary file in Corel Painter 2023
screenshot.caption: LOOKLIBRARY file open in Corel Painter 2023

description: Painter is an app that specializes in composing digital paint-like artwork. It provides various effects for dictating the appearance of paintbrushes, including gradients and flow maps. The look library in Painter organizes looks in one place you can access.
NOTE: You can add or remove looks in a library through the Media Library panel. To open this panel, select Window → Media Panels → Looks .
